hero.title1: We bring joy <0/>to your busy day <0/>as a gift
hero.title2: With healthy and delicious dining experiences,<3/>we add <0>JOY</0> <3/>This is Joyful World

b2c.title: (B2C) <1/>Ready-to-eat <1/>meals & snacks specialist
b2c.body: All our products are made with <0>natural ingredients </0><1/>and <2>in-house developed recipes</2>.<3/>Our food experts craft them with care<1/>to deliver healthy, delicious joy.

b2b.title: (B2B) <1/>Custom food recipes <1/>specialist
b2b.body: We create <0>customized recipes</0> to balance marketability and quality, <1/>tailored to your requests.<3/>From planning to sample tests, <1/>through finalization, <1/><2>nutrition experts</2> manage the whole process.

value.heading: Our Value
value.quote: “<0>Dear friend</0>, <1/>I pray that you may enjoy <2>good health</2><1/> and that <3>all may go well with you</3>,<4/>even as your soul is getting along well.”
value.body: <0>JOYFUL WORLD</0> sincerely wishes every customer<1/>to <2>prosper in all things and be in good health</2>.<3/>We make our products with wholehearted care and sincerity.

boxes.wellbeing_body: For worry-free enjoyment,<3/>we insist on <0>natural ingredients</0>,<3/>thoroughly controlled <1>hygiene facilities</1>,<3/>and uncompromising <2>quality control</2>.<3/>
boxes.flavor_body: To deliver <0>joyful dining experiences</0>, <3/>we continuously research <1/>and develop products.<1/>With consistent taste and quality, <1/>we bring the joy of flavor.
boxes.life_body: We infuse the message that <0/>life is valuable into our products and <0/>share it throughout daily life.<0/>We offer a bite of comfort <0/>and moments of joy.
